articles.title: New Zealand To Rotate Team In Twenty20 Tri-series Versus Pakistan, Bangladesh - Cricket Addictor
articles.description: New Zealand To Rotate Team In Twenty20 Tri-series Versus Pakistan, Bangladesh
articles.content:
The phrase that has long irked All New Zealand fans suggests Black Caps supporters may not know by the end of next week who will make up their starting lineup for the Twenty20 World Cup.
